dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Explores connectedness within the statistical zone within a defined distance.

Calculates:

  • Connectance Index(CI)-number of distinct connected patches

  • Area of parts of patches within the range of connection and its percentage per statistical zone area

  • Area of connection zone between two patches, and its percentage per statistical zone area.

An optional connection layer is generated showing the areas of connection between the patches within a defined distance.

Outputs:

  • ci_np- number of distinct (by FID) connected patches

  • ci_pa- patch area within range of connection

  • ci_pp- percentage of patch area within range of connection to statistical zone area

  • ci_ca- area of connection zone between patches

  • ci_cp- percentage of connection zone between patches to statistical zone area

tool.name: ConnectanceMetricsTool

param.name: in_area
param.dialogReference: A layer with categorical values for which landscape metrics will be calculated.

param.name: stat_layer
param.dialogReference: A layer with statistical zones within which the metrics are calculated (e.g. hexagons, pies, administrative units, watersheds).

param.name: conn_distance
param.dialogReference: Radius for searching of potential connections between the patches.

param.name: class_field
param.dialogReference: Name of field containing classes for which metrics calculations will be performed.

param.name: class_list
param.dialogReference: Selection of specific classes for which metrics calculations will be performed. Patches of selected classes will be analazyed jointly (input layer will not be changed).

param.name: max_allowable_distance
param.dialogReference:
Maximum Allowable Offset for point remove simplification algorithm. Affects output connections layer generalization level. You can choose larger value than default to optimize for computation speed or lower one to obtain more detailed layer.

Default value is optimized for Corine Land Cover layers.

param.name: out_connections
param.dialogReference: Output connection layer with areas of connection between the patches within a defined distance.
